name: Pingüino
description:
Help little Pinguino make it to his igloo home safely. Slip and Slide your way and avoid enemies. Stay Clear of consuming too many fish,  A Full tummy slows Pinguino down causing him to fail. 

Only playable on PC for now, Mobile version coming soon! If you're having any difficulties please read the controls!

This Game Was Made in 72 Hours for The Wowie 3.0 Jam!
Theme: Failure is Progress

CONTROLS Action:Key:JumpSpaceAccelerateRightDecelerate Left Mute AudioQFullscreenFPauseWReset LevelE

If you're wondering how my game connects to the theme "Failure is Progress" In some types of games like Angry Birds or Subway Surfers you need to collect all the collectibles to either win and move onto the next level or get a new high score! This game takes that concept and flips it on the head so in order to win you have to avoid the fish and not get any high score to win!
